Author: motif2019
Text: You are not failing anyone. In fact, your experience with body and food disorders will likely help you to help others. I assume you do not want others to suffer as you have/do. Surely if you were around a 12 year old who wanted to throw up her food or stop eating for a week you'd give her a gentle talk from a loving place. That talk is something that you could give from your heart and from experience.  You can be ill and remain a positive influence.

Author: soberandsalty
Text: ...I spend a week only eating clementines and almond milk   ....I try to eat around quinoa   And EVERY time i fail at being a role model for young girls who believe their self worth is tied to their waistline.
